org.drip.state.creator

Class ScenarioForwardCurveBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.state.creator.ScenarioForwardCurveBuilder

  • public class ScenarioForwardCurveBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    ScenarioForwardCurveBuilder implements the the construction of the scenario Forward curve using the input discount curve instruments, and a wide variety of custom builds. It implements the following functionality: - Non-linear Custom Discount Curve - Shape Preserving Discount Curve Builds - Standard Cubic Polynomial/Cubic KLK Hyperbolic Tension, and other Custom Builds - Smoothing Local/Control Custom Build - DC/Forward/Zero Rate LSQM's - "Industry Standard Methodologies" - DENSE/DUALDENSE/CUSTOMDENSE and Hagan-West Forward Interpolator Schemes
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
